ht32f5xxxx_spi_midi.c File Reference

This file provides all the SPI firmware functions (MIDI Control). More...

#include "ht32f5xxxx_spi_midi.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define IS_MIDICTRL_MODE(MODE)
#define IS_MIDICTRL_CMD_LENGTH(LENGTH)
#define IS_MIDICTRL_AD_LENGTH(LENGTH)
#define IS_MIDICTRL_MODE_LENGTH(LENGTH)
#define IS_MIDICTRL_DUMMY_LENGTH(LENGTH)
#define IS_MIDICTRL_DATA_LENGTH(LENGTH)
#define IS_MIDICTRL_CMD_VALUE(VALUE)   (VALUE <= 0xFF)
#define IS_MIDICTRL_MODE_VALUE(VALUE)   (VALUE <= 0xFF)

Functions

void MIDICTRL_Cmd (HT_SPI_TypeDef *QSPIx, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable QSPI MIDICTRL.
void MIDICTRL_Init (HT_SPI_TypeDef *QSPIx, MIDICTRL_InitTypeDef *MIDICTRL_InitStruct)
 Initialize the QSPIx peripheral MIDICTRL according to the specified parameters in the MIDICTRL_InitStruct.

Detailed Description

This file provides all the SPI firmware functions (MIDI Control).
